errors.error_description: The command to run the application with the reloader enabled is incorrect. The option `--reload` is placed before the `run` command, which is not the correct syntax for the `flask` CLI.
correction_candidates: Change the command to `$ flask run --reload`.
Change the command to `$ flask run-reload`.
Change the command to `$ flask --app app run --reload`.
Change the command to `$ python app.py --reload`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the command to `$ flask run --reload`.
